description:
A new client application for QNAP surveillance system, supporting QVR Pro, QVR Elite and QVP series surveillance appliances.

QVR Pro Client is a new client application for QNAP surveillance system, supporting QVR Pro, QVR Elite and QVP series surveillance appliances. You can browse multiple channels at once, enjoying efficient and easy management of surveillance recordings.
[Important Notes]
- QVR Pro Client installation package is not included in QVR Pro. To install QVR Pro Client, download the latest installation package from the QNAP website: https://www.qnap.com/go/utilities/surveillance
[Fixed Issues]
- Fixed an issue where QVR Smart Search could not display preview images.
- Fixed an issue where search result playback of QVR Smart Search suddenly stopped.
